name: Croc: Legend Of The Gobbos - Level 1 Fan Remake
name_original: Croc: Legend Of The Gobbos - Level 1 Fan Remake
description:
Fan made remake in unreal editor 4 of the opening level from Croc: Legend of the Gobbos! This was meant to be a one week challenge using our own made assets, unreal market place assets and assets from the original game. While most of it was done in a week life got in the way and it turned into a month. 

Made by two of us although all sound was taken from the original game. We do not take any ownership over any of this or any of the original Croc IP/Content and have only created this as a love note to the original game. We have also chosen only to do the first level so not to step on the toes of the Croc rights owners if they want to reboot/remake the franchise one day!  

Anyway please enjoy and thank you for playing :D  

ALSO please support any official releases of Croc that may happen! 

(Just a note.. very buggy... haha )
